title:
A Novel Wavelet-base Algorithm for Reconstruction of the Time-Domain
  Impulse Response from Band-limited Scattering Parameters with Applications
authors: Shantia Yarahmadian, Maryam Rahmani, and Michael Mazzola
abstract:
In this paper, we introduce a novel waveletbased algorithm for reconstructing
time-domain impulse responses from band-limited scattering parameters
(frequencydomain data) with a particular focus on ship hull applications. We
establish the algorithm and demonstrate its convergence, as well as its
efficiency for a class of functions that can be expanded as exponential
functions. We provide simulation results to validate our numerical results.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Signal Processing
